There were a whole bunch of beings standing around at some sort of park like area. “Okay, okay everyone listen up!” Primus said talking into one of those cone things that magnify your voice.

“So what’s going on?” Ren said currently being pressed against Tali. “I noticed that between with you and the others boys there isn’t that much, interaction? I think that’s the right word, between you guys and the ascended and apprentices and whatever else there is. So we are having a scavenger hunt!” Primus cheered, some people in the audience groaning.

“Now, now it’s going to be fun. Here is how it’s going to work: you will be paired up with someone and that will be decided by pulling names out of this awesome top hat I found in the dungeon. Each team will be given a slip of paper. You have to find something that matches that description and bring it back to me. If I think it works I will give you another slip of paper. This will repeat fifteen times, the first person to bring back the fifteen things get to go on an awesome vacation.” Primus explained, Tali fantasizing in her head going on a vacation alone with Ren.

“Now to make sure there isn’t too much chaos I’m going to set down some ground rules. First, you can’t switch partners, get what you get and don’t throw a fit. Second, no leaving the park, don’t worry this place is big there are lots of different environments to it. Third, you have to stay within thirty feet of your partner. Fourth, no killing, maiming, or doing any kind of harm that would require immediate medical attention, I know you ascended and apprentices are immortal and junk but I want this to be fair. You can slow down your opponents in other ways. Fifth, no removing things that are stuck to the ground, you have no idea what kind of hoops I had to jump through to organize this. You can’t use any objects that you didn’t find in this park. Any questions?” Primus asked, noticing Light Blue Diamond raising his hand. “Yes?” “Where are Jerry, Teddy, Leroy and Alfalfa?” The smallest Diamond asked. “Very good question, I have people spread out as referees to make sure no one cheats, also cheating will result in being kicked out and no desert, this applies to everyone. Now for the pairings.”

Primus pulled out a top hat and reached his hand down. “Century and Elsa” the two people named looked at each and nodded recognizing each other’s prescience. “Light Blue Diamond And Black Diamond” Light Blue looked over to the older diamond and blushed, Black Diamond not noticing (or did she?). “Ren and-“

’Please say Tali, please say Tali’ Tali thought closing her eyes. “Zero!” Tali looked down and saw Ren was now gone. She looked up seeing Zero holding Ren like a sack of potatoes. “Pyro and 3” Snaky appeared and whispered into Primus’ ear before disappearing again. “It has come to my knowledge that 3 has been mauled by a fire breathing bear and will not be able to participate. As you know there are the regular angels, dark angels, guardian angels and shoulder angels. Now most people think shoulder angels are just hallucinations when someone was under intense pressure to do the right thing, they are semi-correct. Shoulder devils were just holograms done by demons as a way of screwing with the angels, who were invisible to everyone but the ones they were trying to help. But nowadays demons don’t do that much regarding making humans or most mythical beings do the wrong thing. The thing with shoulder angels was that they are normally tiny, there are times angels are born tiny for reasons currently unknown and they found a use for them helping people make the correct choices. Morgan himself was a tiny angel being twelve years old (a rather young twelve mind you).

All young angels take an exam to see how talented they are and what do you know he was a genius. So the person in charge of the shoulder angels, Matt, offered Morgan a job being a shoulder angel. Zero actually does roll her eyes this time "The only thing that stopped me going monster point and chewing my way through this level 1 Magikarp's internal organs was you, the fact you'd be disturbed and I didn't want to spend tomorrow killing the angels that your report send to purge me" she whispers, then a wide grin appears on her face "One moment please" she then pulls the human so both are staring eye to eye " Hey Diaz. I've thought about trying out a little bit of a Ghostrider battle plan, so any chance you could tell me who you've killed, who's lives you've ruined, that kind of thing?"

The man chuckles and spits in her face, the frown now on her face makes even Morgan grimace

" I don't have to kill you quickly you know, I just need you dead. I can rip off all your limbs break your jaw, tear open your guts and feed you your intestines if I wanted to, and if you piss me off. So answer the bloody question" she orders, grinning when she see's the fear in his eyes before he also smiles

" I don't fucking know" he says with a laugh " You hear those screams? Smell the burning?" he asks and Zero wrinkles her nose, having just noticed

"Huh, so it is. I've always been more a Cetral than Starling girl and the things I've heard made me think this place was just always a shithole. What's the point?"

"That's all because of me, It was a means to an end and got me to my target but a lot of people are dead, dying or suffering because of me. Was that what you wanted to hear?"

Zero's eyes flick over to Morgan who looks conflicted, on the one hand he'd be taught killing was very wrong, and as a shoulder angel should argue against killing in anything other than self defense. On the other hand the person here was clearly a very bad person, someone who could become a demon if left unchecked. This was really a seraphim job not a child angel's and even Zero sympathised with him for getting someone like her as his 1st assignment.

"And let's not forget the kids.." even as an angel Morgan didn't see Zero's hand tear his head off and throw it through the reinforced doors she'd phased through like 10 minutes ago

"The fuck?" Morgan swore accidentally, it seemed Zero was rubbing off on him in a bad way

"The boss has very few rules, and with the exceptions of like 5 reality types, children are not to be harmed (For the record, worlds like Avatar and Pokémon where the fighters are kids are examples of those exceptions), and only him being on his honeymoon with the new ladies is stopping the Boss himself atomising this bastard if he were to know. I actually did him a favour" Zero spits before with a click of her fingers produced a royal purple flame at the tips which she drops on the body that erupts into flames as if doused in gasoline.

The portal jump back to the EU was silent, though Zero could still feel Morgan's prescience on her shoulder so knew he hadn't left yet. It was then she saw the time "ah shite, it's 5 to nine. There anything I need to do so you can get home, punch in void gate co-ordinates? Tear open a Garganta?" she asks with a tilt of her head to the angel who shakes his

"No I'm good, I've got a teleporter, it'll bring me straight home"

Zero blinks but then shrugs "Okay, then we just need to go onto the balcony, Miri's security system means non terrestrial... if you can call a pocket dimension built by an Eternal being terrestrial... warp tech can't function as a way out. Way in is fine as the other security systems, aka anyone in the castle at the time, make short work of any intruders" she explains before moving to the balcony at the top of the tower. From there she gently moves him from her shoulder to the railing at which point he removes his clicker and disappears

Tomorrow?
1213111.title: Zero decides to go do something

12131111.content:
Morgan was at headquarters, he didn’t bother talking to his family because he didn’t want them asking how his first day was, as he technically witnessed a murder.

Morgan was at the receptionists desk, there was a blond woman with green eyes. “Oh you must be the new kid, Morgan, right?” “Uh, yeah I know that I’m not supposed to give my report till Sunday but it’s somewhat of an emergency.” Morgan said timidly, the woman smiled “Of course it’s fine” The woman looked down and pressed a button “Hey Matt, Morgan would like to see you, is that okay?” ”Sure thing Mallory” “Okay, he’s ready for you.” Mallory said Morgan nodding and going over to the door, thankfully there was a smaller door for Morgan.

“Hello Morgan, here to give your report?” Matt asked Morgan nodded with a solemn look using a small elevator attached to the desk. “It’s just, I think the person you have assigned me is more suited for a more advanced angel, I was wandering if I could be given a transfer.” “May I ask why exactly?” Matt asked, Morgan explaining what happened yesterday.

What does Matt say?
12131111.title: Morgan asks for a transfer

121311112.content:
Matt frowns "I'm sorry but transfers are not allowed unless your charge dies... hold it one moment" he then turns to his computer and frowns as he clicks

Morgan tilts his head "Something wrong?"

"Just got the transfers from Ryuk, some of these people are sick fucks. Hey does the name Diaz sound familiar?"

"Um, I think Zero called that guy she killed Diaz" Morgan hums

"How about cause of death, being the top half of his head separating from the bottom?" Morgan grimaces but nods, not that he saw anything as one moment there was a smug prick in a headlock and then a body on the ground missing most of his head "That'll do. I might actually need to thank your crazy charge, this fucker was a bad person, if he had any magic we'd have sent Seraphims after him," Morgan remembers Zero's complaints about if she'd torn the man to shreds she'd have then had to kill any angels that were sent after her "but he's just a normal human so we couldn't do anything about the guy, so the fact Zero put him in Hell is a really good thing"

Morgan blinks "She did something right?" he asks

Matt tilts his hand side to side "Eh, not exactly, just we're not going to have a problem with her anytime soon" at this Morgan hums "Now off you go little one, back to work before Zero does something she probably shouldn't" At this Morgan frowns but nods and runs off to the teleporter

What's Zero doing when he gets there?

1) Eating, luckily something normal people would eat (So no people then)
2) Sleeping, Morgan appearing on her chest, rising and falling as he waits for her to wake up.
121311112.title: “I’m sorry transfers aren’t allowed”

choices: Black Diamond needs help find a small LB
1213111122.content:
Morgan appeared somewhere soft and squishy, which didn’t make sense as the teleporter was supposed to put him directly on Zero’s shoulder. Morgan then saw why he wasn’t on the apprentice’s shoulder. Zero was sleeping snoring rather quietly contrast to her personality. Morgan realized that his platform was unsteady, rising up and down. Morgan looked down and realized he was on Zero’s chest. Morgan squeaked and fell down landing on Zero’s neck.

Zero made some strangled coughing noises before waking up. “What the-- Oh, mornin’ Morgan.” Zero then yawned, her mouth opening dangerously wide. Zero picked up Morgan and left her room not bothering to get changed.

Zero was in her own small kitchen munching on bacon. Which she stole from Tali, she was getting big enough as is with that kid she adopted twelve years back, that for whatever reason sparked a fire in the ascended for the desire to get bigger. No one really knew why but no one was complaining.

Zero noticed that Morgan was staring longingly at her bacon. “Here have some” Zero said pulling on a small portion of one of her bacon strips. “Thank you, Zero.” Morgan started chewing on the piece. “Sure thing kid.” Zero responded smiling at the small angel.

What now?
1213111122.title: Sleeping

choices: Zero gets distracted and BD finds LBD.
12131111222.content:
Zero had planned to just laze around for the day, but the hum of the void gate told her something was happening she was probably going to have to deal with. When a tall, bony woman with ebony coloured skin, a black suit, a jewel in her throat, midnight coloured hair and charcoal grey eyes with a diamond pupil walked in Zero began swearing mentally in every language she could and attempted to swear in Poneglyph, but she couldn't pronounce any of that crap so she just had text inside her mind.

"Hi 13, what do you want?" she asks sounding bored in the hopes she'd annoy Tali or better yet 4

"13? Are all of you people numbered?" Morgan asks in confusion, causing the woman to roll her eyes

"You know exactly who I am 0, 13..."

"Is the Boss with a pale version of your face, I know BD I'm just having a little fun" Zero teases, then a moment later both Morgan and her look up at the Diamond and yell "You can see him/me?"

Black Diamond laughs "Of course little one, we're all linked her through our lord and master: Demon Lord, and Eternal of Madness Serpens Kaos. Therefore what she can see the rest of us can see" she explains, Morgan looks confused but nods anyway

"So what do you want? Again"

"I need help finding Light Blue Diamond. The little one has disappeared on us and the whole family is worried" BD explains, and Morgan whimpers worried about the little guy

"Where was he last seen?" Zero asks

"On earth with his nephew Steven" Zero groans, can't she stay off earth for a single day, she keeps having to kill shit there, she's not even allowed to eat them afterwards and that was before she got a child for a moral compass.

"You should help her, it's the right thing to do" Morgan says, doing his thing to BD's amusement and Zero's annoyance

"Fine, we'll help, just make sure I don't have to fight anyone, this guy is too young to experience death more than once a year and I already did that yesterday" Black Diamond nods and leads the woman and angel back to the gate, typing in the location before activating the device, a dark void forming in the centre of the metal/stone ring.

What happens when they land?

1) With Zero's help they find Light Blue, and Morgan makes himself visible in order to make friends with the lonely gem being
2) Zero being Zero gets distracted, going off on a tangent and BD finds him without them.
12131111222.title: Black Diamond needs help find a small LB

121311112221.content:
Zero landed on a sandy beach, a temple engraved into a mountain. Zero looked over to make sure Morgan was still there, which he thankfully was. "Okay now lets go find the little one." Zero said walking down the beach towards the temple.

"Huh, empty" Zero stated scratching her head before shrugging and leaving the temple.

Now on the board walk Zero saw an arcade, while normally Zero would of just passed by Morgan spoke up. "I sense something coming from the arcade." Zero looked at Morgan with a look of confusion, Morgan just pointed towards the arcade not saying anything, the apprentice sighed before entering the building.

Sitting in the corner was a boy the same size as Morgan and appeared to the same age as well. "Who are you?" The boy had light blue skin and a darker blue hair and diamond shaped pupils. "I'm Zero, Black Diamond sent me, where's Steven?" Zero said to the gem. "He saw Connie and decided to go hang out with her." Light Blue sighed, Morgan decided to make himself visible. "Hi, I'm Morgan." The angel said jumping down from Zero's shoulder and walking over to small Diamond. "I'm Light Blue Diamond" The boy said standing up and shaking Morgan's hand.

"Thank you for finding him" Zero turned around seeing Black Diamond. "Hello little one, we were getting worried." Black said walking over and picking up the young gem. "While Light Blue looks young in reality he is around 6,000 years old". (I did research on the Steven Universe timeline). Black Diamond then vanishes into thin air. Zero sighs and decides to go back home.

What now
121311112221.title: Morgan makes a new friend

121312.content:
Zero looked down at Morgan with a wicked grin, Morgan shivered with a terrified look on his face. “Like I said before I am happy where I currently am. I don’t need a little kid to whisper in my ear. However, I think you would make a good pet.” Zero said, Morgan’s face turned grim, but before he could do anything her was grabbed and dropped into Zero’s ice cream.

Morgan’s life flashed before his eyes; more specifically the day he became a shoulder angel.

Morgan was called to the principal’s office during class. He was currently waiting in the front office to be called in. Morgan heard doors open and he turned around seeing his parents, Robin and Chrom, who unlike Morgan were normal sized. The secretary Miss Candle (Wicke) noticed the arrival of the adults. “Oh good, you are here, Mrs. Aether will see you now.” Robin picked up Morgan and the three walked into the room.

Inside was a tall blond woman with long hair that covered one of her eyes. “Oh hello Mr and Mrs. Exalt I am so pleased that you could make it, please sit down.” The woman said with a pleasant tone, Robin setting Morgan on the desk as she and her husband sat down in chairs.

“Is Morgan in trouble?” Robin asked even though she knew Morgan was a good kid. “No, no, not at all. As you know the exams were yesterday and we were reviewing Morgan’s scores and were astounded about how well he had done.” Miss Aether explained, Morgan doing a silent sigh of relief.

The exams were sort of a combination of an IQ test and a career placement test to see what were the best possible careers for the kids and how well they would be at them.

“How well did Morgan do?” Chrom asked feeling proud of his youngest child. “I believe Mr. Meese can answer that.” The principal said; there was a poof and a short angel wearing a white T-shirt and white shorts appeared in the room. He had brown hair and brown eyes and was short but if you looked closely he was somewhat muscular. “I am Matthew Meese, I am the head of the shoulder angel department, Morgan here got a perfect score on the shoulder angel section of the exam. So I have decided to offer him to become an official shoulder angel.” The short angel said with a twinkle in his eye. “I accept!” Morgan said without hesitation. “Morgan, sweetie what if you get hurt?” Robin asked with concern. “Not to worry, all shoulder angels are equipped with an emergency button in case if things south. If the button doesn’t work there is a separate button that sends a distress signal to headquarters and we’ll send a team of highly qualified angels to assist.” This seemed to sooth the worries of Morgan’s parents, “Well if Morgan wants to do it and Morgan will be safe I will allow this.” Robin said Chrom agreeing.

Morgan was pulled out of his flashback. He was somewhere dark, damp, both warm and cold at the same time. Morgan patted his sides to see if he could find the distress signal or the emergency teleporter. They were both gone.

What Now?
121312.title: She's rather keep him as a pet

choices: Morgan meets another being, back from a mission
1213121.content:
Zero smiles sweetly as she saunters into her quarters, sitting down on the bed before putting the bowl on her lap and allowing her jaw to split, her mandibles spreading as far as they could allowing the ice cream angel to fall into the bowl with a wet splat.

Morgan manages to peak out of the gooey ice cream in time to yelp in shock, Zero's cataract white eyes were mildly creepy before but coupled with her painfully stretched skin and a mouth that wouldn't look out of place on a necromorph or Volatile Zombie, he watched, mildly traumatised as the bony mandibles slotted back together and then her skin repaired itself as though she had a human jaw. It was then he realised Zero's eyes were on him the entire time.

"Well little one I'm glad to see you have quite a nice taste, once I had time to assimilate your magical aura so it no longer itches my throat. So pet, what can you do besides be a tiny voice in my head or try to circumvent my broken beyond repair moral compass?" Zero asks, resting her chin on the heel of her hand

Morgan wriggles then pulls himself out of the ice cream so he can sit on the lip of the bowl "Um, I can bake, I've been told I have magic hands whaever that means, so I can perform massages. You said I taste good so as long as you don't chew I could be like a sweet treat or something, and I like to cuddle, Mom says I'm the best cuddler she knows and her sister was a BIG cuddler when they were young" he explains ,Zero smiles and pets him on the head

"Well it sounds like I made the right choice for a pet then, so many things we could do little one" she purrs and bats her eyes, mostly just because it confused the little angel as she picked him up and properly put him on her lap

What happens next?

1) She decides to start with the massage, having a few years of tension locked up in her thin frame
2) Another Apprentice or Ascended comes back from a mission and comes check on/annoy Zero, getting introduced to Morgan in the process.
1213121.title: Morgan is released

12131211.content:
Zero's lips curl into a smile, which for the first time in a while wasn't cruel, nor was it followed by bloody violence. Instead what followed was her picking Morgan up and shifting for she was lying on her front, setting the angel on the base of her neck. Resting her chin on her crossed arms Zero finally speaks "Time to see if your massage skills are as good as you make them sound. I probably have a few centuries of stress and kinks back there so do what you can" she orders playfully, but Morgan took it as a challenge, especially when with a flick of her wrist her clothes seemed to burn away to nothing, revealing bone white skin, as well as noticeable shoulder blades and even a rib or 2.

"You don't eat much do you?" Morgan mutters mostly to himself but Zero still chuckles

"Bitch I eat people" she growls, then cackles, making Morgan think she was quoting something rather than simply answering his question "Doesn't change this form. This body is the closest I'll ever come to being human again, it's not even alive, not really and my old skin was warped when I made it fit my new body even compressed" she sighs deeply, then inhales sharply as Morgan runs his small hands along her spine, feeling the bumps of each vertebrae if he applies even a little pressure.

"You are a very strange being" he says more conversationally than his last comment, which clearly amuses the... whatever she is these days

"You don't know the half of it. I'm a template, the name I took is rather literal: As the 1st apprentice, formed by my need to be prefect leading me to gorge on the Bloodrayne and bastardise my form to something beyond human comprehension. I am Subject Zero, or maybe Patient Zero given the number of bodies in my wake due to the Apprentice project itself. I only look human because Lucifer made me a ring to contain and turn my old skin as well as any I rip from my victims into what is best described as a suit, even had Arla Cogan show me how to do it properly before sending her on her way.... and I mean that literally, didn't kill the crazy blond serial killer, she was allowed walk away after helping me with my monster issues" Zero explains, her story only interrupted by little grunts and hisses while Morgan works

"You have a lot less tension than I expected, might be because you think you're dead..."

"I never said that" Zero defends, leaving out her lack of heartbeat, mostly because the Boss doesn't have one either last anyone checked

"But still you are much more relaxed than you seemed to believe. Any idea why?"

Zero shrugs "Z and I were VERY sexually active, when your wife is a hot red head and a witch it makes sense, and I suppose I've always enjoyed causing mayhem and killing things, makes me a monster but I don't really care" she sighs deeply as Morgan reaches the end of her spine, sitting at the base of her tailbone to take a break.

What now?

1) Zero decides to feed her little masseur as a reward
2) The pleasure from Morgan's massage has gotten Zero hot and bothered, time to make an angel fall the fun way
3) Zero senses another apprentice, and decides to see if the others can see Morgan too, through their shared link via Kaos. Turns out they can and they find Morgan adorable :D
12131211.title: Zero has him massage her

122.content:
Today we will tell the story of kingdom of Bux and it's inhabitants, but before we do that here is our starting cast of characters.

Black Diamond: The Queen of Bux and eldest of the Diamond family, specializes in dark magic, the most dangerous of her siblings.

White Diamond: The second oldest of the diamond family, specializes in wind magic, the most serious of her siblings.

Yellow Diamond: The middle child of the diamond family, specializes in electric magic, the most aggressive of her siblings.

Pink Diamond: The second youngest of the diamond family, specializes in light magic, the most curious of her siblings.

Light Blue Diamond: The youngest of the diamond family, specializes in time magic, the most insecure about himself out of his siblings.

Chrom: Captain of the royal gaurd, a bit of a dork but an incredible swordsman.

Robin: Chrom's wife, a powerful mage and a great tactician.

Morgan: The son of Chrom and Robin, works part time at a bakery.

Lucina: Morgan's older sister, can be overprotective at times but means well, a great swordswoman.

Grima: Robin's identical twin sister, she has red eyes as opposed to Robin's hazel, a major fun lover, one of the Queen's adivisors.

Aversa: Robin and Grima's older sister, loves to tease her siblings but is also very protective of them.

Ren: A painter who works part time at the same bakery as Morgan.

Tali: Ren's "caretaker" whether or not she's his adoptive mother is for you to decide.

Zero: One of Tali's closest friends, a bit wild.

Livewire: Another one of Tali's closest friends, a bit quirky.

Chihiro: Livewire's son, incredibly timid.

Century: A young musician, his living situation is currently unknown.

Gaius: A former thief who owns the bakery Morgan and Ren work at.

Kiran: A regular at the bakery, a glutton for foods with frosting and icing, Morgan has a crush on her.

Cordelia: Gaius' wife, used to have a crush on Morgan's father.

Severa: Gaius' and Cordelia's daughter, Morgan and Lucina's mutual friend.

Sully: A member of the royal guard, a tomboy.

Ricken: Sully's husband, was cursed to look like a fourteen year old.

Kjelle: Sully and Ricken's daughter, Is in Lucina's group of friends, training to become a member of the royal guard.

Tharja: A dark mage, Robin's best friend, can be creepy at times.

Henry: Tharja's husband, also a dark mage, incredibly cheerful.

Noire: Tharja and Henry's daughter, part of Lucina's friend group, is both an archer and dark mage.

Loyd: A rookie to the royal guard, incredibly calm and a fan of music.

Mickey: A rookie to the royal guard, loves to fight.

Now there is something special about the women of the kingdom of Bux but what is it?
122.title: The Kingdom of Bux

1221.content:
Queen Black Diamond grins wickedly as she surveys her territory, her large, purple eyes flash with magic

'Aunt BD' she turns, surprised to hear a voice in her room

'Lapis, you're not meant to be in here' Black Diamond chuckles as Blue, Yellow's twin and an experienced water magic user rushes in after her daughter Lapis, oddly enough unlike the other females of the Court of Bux she was the size of a normal human, making her practically a doll to her favourite aunt, or a baby to the Queen's younger siblings

'Hello my dear, why are you sneaking into my chambers?' the Queen asks

'Can we have cakes? You said 'The Sweet Tooth' had the best cakes ever, please can we send for some?' the blue skinned princess pleads, big puppy eyes blink up at her obsidian skinned aunt, while her mother prays her sister wasn't having a bad day or she'd be missing out on a few hours of study (Diamonds can't be digested, neither can humans provided they have certain talismans or runic tattoos on their person when they get swallowed)

Black Diamond smiles as she picks her niece up and places her on her shoulder 'That sounds like a brilliant plan, I'm glad I thought of it' she says, pausing when Lapis tries to stifle her giggle fit and Blue sighs in relief 'Do you think we should get a cake for Mommy, she has been a bit of a stick in the mud recently?'

Lapis chuckles 'Nope, more cakes for us!' she squeals

BD gasps 'Just us, none for Pink or Yellow or White or Jazz?' she adds the last just to see the purple blush, in any other kingdom a princess falling for her bodyguard would be scandalous, but in Bux it was just cute, it was also not something Blue knew about or else she'd have had the woman sent to the front line, annoying both Lapis and Yellow as she'd trained the orange skinned axe wielder herself specifically to protect The Family.

'Cake for Jazz, she has to put up with a lot' Lapis mumbles and both elder royals know she's talking about herself, given the size difference between herself and the other women in the kingdom Lapis liked to explore and Royal Guardian Jasper could at one time have often be seen running after the annoyingly bouncy water elemental or else frantically searching for her, with her wild grey hair slicked back due to nervous sweat. It had gotten a lot calmer these days, mostly because the woman had taken to shoving Lapis in her cleavage when she got energetic, which oddly enough made her think of Pink and Pearl, seriously if they were any other country they'd be a disgrace to nobility with all the staff screwing.

'Okay then, I'll send someone to collect some cakes fit for the most important people... and Blue' she teases, getting chuckles from Lapis and an eye roll from Blue, as well as a weak water whip which bounced of Black's barrier spell. The Queen to a nation of millions, sticks her forked tongue out and laughs before walking out the door, luckily Blue was the calmest of her sibling, and was used to Black's random nature and possible insanity,

Where to next?

The bakery, where Morgan and Ren have to make a selection of treats not just for the customers in the mixed size bakery, but also fulfil the royal request
The court, where Black Diamonds loyal advisors... argue like children and tell jokes like they're all still in their teens. God how is this kingdom functioning? Oh yeah magic.
The barracks, Yellow's own personal kingdom, and the day to day lives of such hard workers as Kjelle, Lloyd, and Luicna, and such loons as Pyro (rookie royal guard member, as expected a fire magic specialist) and Micky
1221.title: The kingdom of Bux, a Female Elbaf

12211.content:
Ren and Morgan were currently at the bakery with the assistance of Light Blue. Now you might be thinking wouldn’t he get noticed as he is the prince of Bux. But considering the fact almost all of the women of Bux were giants he was often overlooked, most people not knowing what he looked like or even knew there was a prince of Bux.

Right now they were crazy busy because of an order from the queen, which was delivered by some regular servant guy.

“I blame Lapis for this”Light Blue mumbled, while it was easier to do this with his time magic speeding up his movement speed.

Once everything came out of the oven they were all the exhausted. “Light Blue, if White knew you helped out around here she wouldn’t be happy. Light Blue looked up saw Black with Lapis onher shoulder. “Don’t worry I’ll help.” Black Diamond said grabbing her brother and eating him before grabbing her the cakes and leaving.

What happens next
12211.title: Baking!

choices: The treat is done, Kiran leaves with it
There's an extra surprise for her, as Morgan falls into the cake
122112.content:
Morgan pouts as the giantess leaves with the youngest diamond 'Well there goes a good portion of our workforce, and at rush hour too'

Ren sighs in agreement 'I know, makes me wish you're cousin Century was allowed leave the castle'

'Yeah, but after Uncle Sans died Aversa got really overprotective of Century. I think some days he doesn't see the world outside her cleavage, a feeling I'm sure you're used to' Morgan teases

'Hey!' Ren squeaks, flicking flower at Morgan

'It's true though, if Tali had her way those big purple boobies of hers would be the only thing you ever saw, not at anyone would complain'

'Dude! She's my mom, I don't need to be reminded she's really hot' Ren hisses with a ruby red blush, Tali having found him abandoned as a 3 year old in the street and raised him as her own, and given her size and body type Ren spent a lot of time curled up against her bouncy bust and massive rear as her grew.

'I know, but not by blood. Anyway we have another customer looking for treats' Morgan says, heading to the order station while Ren barrels to the main baking area. When it got there Morgan felt a little tongue tied, their next customer was Kiran, a young-ish Maleficarum that Morgan had a really deep crush on, but never even tried to act on due to not thinking the girl would want someone like him, that and he's sure his overprotective sister would scare the kind dragon-woman away

'Oh hey Morgan' the woman greets with the voice of an angel (or at least in Morgan's opinion it was) 'I was wondering if I could have a Mystic special, to go?' she asks and Morgan fights a blush: the mystic special was a treat that had an enchantment added during the process to enhance the eater's assets, and while Morgan liked her the way she was, Kiran was rather flat for her species.

'Um sure, will you be paying in beri or rupees today?' he asks, due to the large port and closeness to an island chain all businesses had the prices in the local rupee as well as the island currency of the beri

'240 beri, exact' Kiran smiles widely as she passes the money over, Morgan nods before dropping it into the hole sending it into the register for sorting later by Gaius

'Okay, it should take about 10-15 minutes Kiran, if you don't mind waiting' Morgan explains before running to get to Ren

'Ren! 1 mystic special to go for Kiran' he yells, to which the other boy smirks

'Oh, you're girlfriend is trying to make herself bigger to catch your eye then' he teases, glad to get a chance to strike back at his friend

'She's not my girlfriend and what she does is her decision' Morgan argues back, Ren rolls his eyes but the 2 get to work quickly

What now?
122112.title: Bakery life

choices: A Drunk Kiran Stumbles into the neighborhood (Oh boy)
Zero plays keep away with Tali, using Ren
1221121.content:
Once the treat was finished, Ren ringed a bell dragging Morgan out of his daydreams while he was staring at an oblivious Kiran. "Morgan I can't move this thing myself." Ren said Morgan holding up a finger to Kiran. "Just a second" Morgan walked up to the cake and touched it focusing his magic into it before it floated into Kiran's arms. "Thanks Morgan, thanks Ren, I'll see you later!" Kiran called before leaving the building.

Once rush hour was over Gaius sent the boys homes. "I wander what Light Blue's doing right now?" Ren asked, "No clue, maybe sharing some cake with his sisters?" Morgan suggested before the boys entered the neighborhood they lived in, passing by several giant women who were too busy with their own thing to notice the boys. "Have you ever wondered why is it the women in Bux tend to be giants, I did research on other countries but none of them of have giants who don't have buxan blood in them." Ren said to his blue haired friend. "Hmm, I don't really think about those kinds of things as its not really important, I just accept the things that happen in my life and carry on." Morgan said as he saw his house in view. "I'll see you tomorrow Ren" Morgan waved before entering the house which had a portal to the castle.

What happens now?
1221121.title: The treat is done, Kiran leaves with it

1221122.content:
During the process of the cake being made Morgan fell in and was taken away by an unaware Kiran. Ren not doing anything as he knew that Morgan would be fine because of his magic birthmarks. As well Kiran was Morgan's next door neighbor.

1453.content:
Hero vs Hero

Welcome to the fantasy world of Adula, where heroes, monsters and deities wage a daily battle for supremacy. Create your character and test them against challengers to see who'll come out on top.

Basically as the summary said, this is a vs interactive where you create a character and have them fight against characters.

Rules...

Characters are divided into categories. Currently, there's three; deities, monsters and heroes (I'll let people add other categories). Some categories may have special rules of their own to make things interesting. You can challenge someone from any category.

You're not required to accept a challenge.

No ending chapters, we have limited room to work with after all. When a battle ends post an updated version of your character's bio in the next chapter.

Example:

Character A has defeated Character B!

Choice 1: Character A's Updated Bio

Choice 2: Character B's Updated Bio

On the updated bio, you can give your character new abilities they gained by winning the fight. Or, if they lost the battle, you can detail what abilities they lost.

Don't make your character unbeatable.

Don't self-proclaim your victory and always give your opponent a chance to respond.
What not to do: "My character punches yours in the face and knocks them out, I win!"

Respect and abide by a person's Battle Conditions, which I'll go over in the bios themselves.

No one line entries.

You can find a categories special rules and the character bio's on their main page.

Feel free to message me if you have any questions.
1453.title: Hero vs Hero

145311.content:
The Deities of Adula re among the most powerful beings in the world. But even they aren't above being usurped or defeated. If you want to embark down this path, know that it'll be a constant struggle to stay on top. Do you think you're up for the challenge?

(Special Rules…)
Deities are organized by a power level system that determines the amount of abilities you can have. Your level is determined by how many worshipers you have.

If you defeat a deity you can steal up to half their worshipers, or none at all if you prefer.

If you defeat a monster, all the people who were afraid of it will start worshiping you.

If you gain enough worshipers, you’ll move up a level.

Each deity has a domain, whether literal (The sun, fire, ice) or abstract (war, death, love).

Deities can’t die, they can only lose all their worshipers.

You can start with a maximum of 50,000 worshipers.

(God Levels…)
King/Queen of the Gods: A title given to whoever’s the strongest deity. If you character currently has this title you’re rewarded with this special ability.
King/Queen’s Decree: If you defeat a deity you can take all their worshipers if you want.

You lose this ability if someone surpasses you.

Maximum abilities: 14

14531221.content:
(Special Rules)
Heroes work differently from deities and monsters as their power is determined by experience, rather than devotion or fear. Positive experience will make them stronger while negative experience may give them a new weakness.

Whenever you win a battle you gain an ability.

Whenever you lose a battle you gain a weakness.

Your abilities and weaknesses can be physical or magical.

In addition to experience, heroes have fame. Which they gain through defeating others, whether they be heroes, deities or monsters. For every 10,000 Fame you gain you can choose a weakness to get rid of.

Defeating a deity/monster with 10,000 points or less earns you 5,000 Fame.

Defeating a deity/monster with 10,000 to 150,000 points earns you 10,000 Fame.

Defeating a deity/monster with 150,000 to 500,000 points earns you 15,000 Fame

Defeating a deity/monster with 500,000+ points earns you 20,000 Fame

Defeating the King/Queen of the Monsters/Gods earns you 25,000 Fame

Being defeated by a monster/deity costs you 10,000 Fame.

Defeating a hero with more fame than you puts you on their level.
Example: If you defeat a hero with 25,000 Fame your fame also becomes 25,000

Being defeated by a hero with less fame than you brings you down to their level.
Example; If you're defeated by a hero with 5,000 Fame your fame also becomes 5,000

You can start with a maximum of 10,000 Fame.

You start with at least one weakness and a maximum of five abilities.
